definition: Hsiushui township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
handsome/refined/elegant/graceful/superior/show (loanword)/CL:場|场[chang2]/(literary) to grow/to bloom/(of crops) to produce ears
surname Shui
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
Hsiushui township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan

sentences.english: Then, the Silk Street will be a good choice.
sentences.chinese: 那樣的話，秀水街是個不錯的選擇。

sentences.english: Does this bus go to Silk Street?
sentences.chinese: 這輛公交車經過秀水街嗎？

sentences.english: Silk Street used to be full of fakes and imitations.
sentences.chinese: 秀水街原來都是假貨和仿製品。

sentences.english: Some Silk Street Market stalls were shut down temporarily.
sentences.chinese: 部分秀水街商戶被暫時關閉。

sentences.english: Chapter one begins the case study of silk street jewelry market.
sentences.chinese: 第一章將開始對“秀水街”珠寶市場的個案分析。

sentences.english: The old Silk street was torn down.
sentences.chinese: 老的秀水街早已被拆了。

sentences.english: The Silk Street Market case suggests that change is slow and painful.
sentences.chinese: 秀水街事件表明這一轉變是緩慢而且代價巨大的。

sentences.english: Gui Lin is famous for the graceful water and marvellous mountain in the world.
sentences.chinese: 桂林以婀娜多姿的奇山秀水著稱於世。

sentences.english: Xiushui Silk Market is popular among visitors.
sentences.chinese: 秀水絲綢市場比較受遊客的歡迎。

sentences.english: Likes the nature the green hill Xiu water, likes the outdoors the building activities.
sentences.chinese: 喜歡大自然的青山秀水，愛好戶外的健身活動。

sentences.english: There's a brand new Silk Street.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一條新的秀水街。

sentences.english: Sites around XiuSui of Faku, Liaoning, is a good choice for one day tour.
sentences.chinese: 遼寧法庫秀水河一帶，是個一日遊的好去處。

sentences.english: Anyone tired of the same old Xiu Shui shopping?
sentences.chinese: 有沒有人厭倦了一貫的到秀水街購物呢？

sentences.english: Recently it has been renamed Xiushui Clothing Market.
sentences.chinese: 現已改名秀水服裝市場。
